attributes.contentHtml: Can I say something? Rednodes amd purnodes are node related to each other. Im thr owner of rednodes. Eisk was dev not the owner . How can you say purenodes did crime ? For example: if I did a crime then I join a company how you say the company did the crime ? Rednodes have nothing to do with pure nodes I'm the owner of rednodes and I'm saying idont have anything to do with pure nodes

attributes.bio: “Take the hard drive out of my computer at home… Put it in the bath… And make sure it’s completely wiped.”
